actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that a State containing an ozone nonattainment area that does not significantly contribute to ozone nonattainment in its own area or any other area shall be treated as satisfying certain requirements if the State makes certain submissions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to revise provisions relating to rural transport areas. Treats rural or nonrural areas that do not contribute significantly to nonattainment as satisfying requirements for ozone nonattainment areas if the State makes implementation plan submissions required for Marginal nonattainment areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that a State containing an ozone nonattainment area that does not significantly contribute to ozone nonattainment in its own area or any other area shall be treated as satisfying certain requirements if the State makes certain submissions, and for other purposes.
